subject: Offer Letter for Frontend Developer
text: Congratulations! You've been selected for the Frontend Developer role at Google.
html: Congratulations! You've been selected for the Frontend Developer role at Google.

subject: Application Received – Software Development Engineer
text: We've received your application for the Software Development Engineer position at Amazon.
html: We've received your application for the Software Development Engineer position at Amazon.

subject: Interview Scheduled – Cloud Engineer Role
text: Your interview for the Cloud Engineer role at Microsoft is scheduled for May 25 at 2 PM IST.
html: Your interview for the Cloud Engineer role at Microsoft is scheduled for May 25 at 2 PM IST.

subject: Application Status – UI/UX Designer
text: Thank you for applying to Meta. We regret to inform you that you were not selected.
html: Thank you for applying to Meta. We regret to inform you that you were not selected.

subject: Follow-up on your Data Engineer Application
text: We wanted to check in and see if you're still interested in the Data Engineer position at Netflix.
html: We wanted to check in and see if you're still interested in the Data Engineer position at Netflix.

subject: job Offer – Lead Engineer at Postmark
text:
Hi Shivam,

We’re excited to offer you the position of Lead Engineer at Postmark!

After reviewing your experience and interview performance, we believe you’ll be a great fit to lead our engineering efforts and shape our technology roadmap.

Position: Lead Engineer  
Start Date: June 10, 2025  
Location: Remote-first (India timezone)

Please reply to this email or click the link below to review the offer letter and confirm your acceptance:
https://postmarkapp.com/offers/lead-engineer https://acme-tech.com/offers/lead-engineer

Welcome aboard!

Regards,  
Postmark Manager 
Senior Recruiter, Postmark
html:
Hi Shivam,

We’re excited to offer you the position of Lead Engineer at Postmark!

After reviewing your experience and interview performance, we believe you’ll be a great fit to lead our engineering efforts and shape our technology roadmap.

Please reply to this email or click the link below to review the offer letter and confirm your acceptance:

Welcome aboard!

Regards,
